text: @fordnation This is incredible! You are giving our “heroes” an extra $4/hr or $28/day or $150/week or $600/month to take care of the most vulnerable in society! Thank you @fordnation @celliottability for your generosity. This is the type of leadership that will help fight #COVID19 https://t.co/s7LIUqzcQ9
